segments.text: I am sorry , but I cannot stay for the rest of class today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you need to leave early ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t feel so good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel as if I am going to be sick to my stomach .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps you should get checked out at the Student Health Center before you go home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have some medicine at home that I could take .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you going to be OK to drive home , or would you like someone to go with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , but my friend is in the library , and he can give me a ride home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We hope that you are feeling better soon . E-mail me if you have any questions .
segments.speaker: S2
